fr:mainmatter.fr:p: Every logos \mathcal {E} has a subobject classifier \top : \mathbf {1}_{\mathcal {E}} \rightarrowtail \Omega .
A cocomplete and left exact category \mathcal {E} is a logos when it satisfies the following conditions:

fr:ol.fr:li: Colimits are universal: given a morphism f : F \to E : \mathcal {E}, the pullback functor f^* : {\mathcal {E}}_{/E} \to {\mathcal {E}}_{/F} is cocontinuous.
\mathcal {E} has a small generating set: there exists a small set of objects \mathcal {E}' \subseteq \mathcal {E} such that morphisms with domain C \in \mathcal {E}' are jointly epic.
